BMills & Allen          G4802541a  C  1pTbs1AWINTER RECIPES by MARION ELLIS
T(,$GFRENCH APPT
Q&p)
Qd#8GMake a swee pastry by adding T(,$G1oI[ugar and one egg to a
Tbs1Gbasic shortcrust.
T(,$GLine the dish wth thinly sliced
Q&p)Geating apples.
Qd#8GCaramelise 3oz sugar with 1oz
T(,$G~[le water.
Tbs1GPour the caramel over the apples
T(,$Gand cover with flan pastry.
Q&p)
Qd#8GBake 30 mins at 400F.
T(,$GTurn out upside down to serve.
Tbs1GEat this either hot or cold.
T(,$GIt is delicious with cream.
Q&p)
Qd#8FDon't forget you can put the phone T(,$Fdown and still hold the text on theTbs1Fscreen for as long as you need it. T(,$G           BFOR OTHER MENUS press 0
